title: Reeses font???? URGENT PLEASE
content:
Anyone know what this font is / where i can get it??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131114094422im_/http:/typophile.com/files/300px-Reese's_logo_4198.svg.png)
author: riceah

comments.content: This is not a font, but rather a drawn logo. There are a few free font derivatives floating around, but i think they are of pretty poor quality.
yeah.. i figured as much, I just drew it myself.. Thanks so much though!!!
